content:
To improve the answer to the question, “How does your project differ from similar ones?” the following could be added:
Our project differs from similar ones in Mexico in several key ways. Firstly, unlike the two big events held in the country last year, which were run by ETHGlobal and a private entity, respectively, our event is being created by the Ethereum Mexico Community Team, with a focus on community building and education. We believe that the most important event about Web3 should be created by the community for the community, and that workshops and talks about how Ethereum and all the protocols built on it could bring new tools and opportunities for the people are essential.
Secondly, our event aims to highlight the strong core values of the Ethereum ecosystem in Mexico. In the past year, we have seen a growing community of people who are involved in projects and getting on board with the Ethereum ecosystem. We believe that our event will provide an opportunity for attendees to network and collaborate with others who share their passion and values for Ethereum.
Lastly, our event is focused on accessibility and affordability for the Mexican people. We recognize that many individuals in Mexico are interested in learning about the Ethereum ecosystem but cannot afford to attend events in other parts of the world. By hosting an event in Mexico City, we are providing a more accessible and affordable option for individuals who want to learn about Ethereum and its potential to transform industries beyond finance.
